## Problem 2

Create data frame, delete rows with na dumpster and round the number of sports-balls to integer
```{r}
TrashWheel_df = 
    read_excel("./data/Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-7-2020-2.xlsx") %>% 
    janitor::clean_names() %>% 
    drop_na(dumpster) %>% 
    mutate(
      sports_balls = as.integer(round(sports_balls))
    )
```
